mapper.sql: FS_NO, FS_REGIONNO, FS_NAME, FS_DESR, FS_OPENTIME, FS_TEL, FD_SINGLERETURN, FD_TOTALRETURN, FD_MANTIP, FD_PARKTIP, FD_STAYTIME, FS_POLICY, FI_STAT
mapper.insert: insert into TSHOP (FS_NO, FS_REGIONNO, FS_NAME, FS_DESR, FS_OPENTIME, FS_TEL, FD_SINGLERETURN, FD_TOTALRETURN, FD_MANTIP, FD_PARKTIP, FD_STAYTIME, FS_POLICY, FI_STAT) values (#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singlereturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalreturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mantip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parktip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{staytime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{policy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into TSHOP
FS_NO,
FS_REGIONNO,
FS_NAME,
FS_DESR,
FS_OPENTIME,
FS_TEL,
FD_SINGLERETURN,
FD_TOTALRETURN,
FD_MANTIP,
FD_PARKTIP,
FD_STAYTIME,
FS_POLICY,
FI_STAT,

#{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{desr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update TSHOP
FS_REGIONNO = #{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_DESR = #{desr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_OPENTIME = #{opentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FD_SINGLERETURN = #{singlereturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FD_TOTALRETURN = #{totalreturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FD_MANTIP = #{mantip,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FD_PARKTIP = #{parktip,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FD_STAYTIME = #{staytime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FS_POLICY = #{policy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FI_STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where FS_NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TSHOP set FS_REGIONNO = #{regionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_DESR = #{desr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_OPENTIME = #{opentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FD_SINGLERETURN = #{singlereturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FD_TOTALRETURN = #{totalreturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FD_MANTIP = #{mantip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FD_PARKTIP = #{parktip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FD_STAYTIME = #{staytime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FS_POLICY = #{policy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FI_STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where FS_NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from TSHOP where 1=1
and FS_NO like '%'||#{no}||'%'
and FS_REGIONNO like '%'||#{regionno}||'%'
and FS_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
and FS_DESR like '%'||#{desr}||'%'
and FS_OPENTIME like '%'||#{opentime}||'%'
and FS_TEL like '%'||#{tel}||'%'
and FD_SINGLERETURN like '%'||#{singlereturn}||'%'
and FD_TOTALRETURN like '%'||#{totalreturn}||'%'
and FD_MANTIP like '%'||#{mantip}||'%'
and FD_PARKTIP like '%'||#{parktip}||'%'
and FD_STAYTIME like '%'||#{staytime}||'%'
and FS_POLICY like '%'||#{policy}||'%'
and FI_STAT = #{stat}

select * from (select ROWNUM as rowno, t.* from TSHOP t where 1=1
and FS_NO like '%'||#{no}||'%'
and FS_REGIONNO like '%'||#{regionno}||'%'
and FS_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
and FS_DESR like '%'||#{desr}||'%'
and FS_OPENTIME like '%'||#{opentime}||'%'
and FS_TEL like '%'||#{tel}||'%'
and FD_SINGLERETURN like '%'||#{singlereturn}||'%'
and FD_TOTALRETURN like '%'||#{totalreturn}||'%'
and FD_MANTIP like '%'||#{mantip}||'%'
and FD_PARKTIP like '%'||#{parktip}||'%'
and FD_STAYTIME like '%'||#{staytime}||'%'
and FS_POLICY like '%'||#{policy}||'%'
and FI_STAT = #{stat}
and ROWNUM <= #{endrow}
) tt where 1=1
and tt.rowno >= #{startrow}
